ticket.title: User mysql2 taked uninitialized constant Mysql error.
ticket.original-body:
hsli@hs-li:~/work/homeland$ rake db:create --trace (in /home/hsli/work/homeland) ** Invoke db:create (first_time) ** Invoke db:load_config (first_time) ** Invoke rails_env (first_time) ** Execute rails_env ** Execute db:load_config ** Execute db:create rake aborted! uninitialized constant Mysql version.title: User mysql2 taked uninitialized constant Mysql error.

version.body:
This is Rails3 Rc2 my database.yml:
development: adapter: mysql encoding: utf8 reconnect: false database: homeland_development pool: 5 username: monster password: 123123 host: 172.28.150.23
version.body-html:
This is Rails3 Rc2 my database.yml:

development:
adapter: mysql encoding: utf8 reconnect: false database: homeland_development pool: 5 username: monster password: 123123 host: 172.28.150.23
version.title: User mysql2 taked uninitialized constant Mysql error.

version.body:
last is wrong, I use mysql2 not mysql
development: adapter: mysql2 encoding: utf8 reconnect: false database: homeland_development pool: 5 username: monster password: 123123 host: 172.28.150.23
version.body-html:
last is wrong, I use mysql2 not mysql

development:
adapter: mysql2
encoding: utf8
reconnect: false
database: homeland_development
pool: 5
username: monster
password: 123123
host: 172.28.150.23
version.title: User mysql2 taked uninitialized constant Mysql error.

version.body: You need to have mysql2 in your Gemfile not mysql - works fine for me in a new app.
version.body-html: You need to have mysql2 in your Gemfile not mysql - works fine for me in a new app.
version.title: User mysql2 taked uninitialized constant Mysql error.

version.body:
I was installed mysql2! and I found the resolvtion. when I change database.yml to: development: adapter: mysql2 encoding: utf8 reconnect: false database: "homeland_development" pool: 5 username: "monster" password: "123123" host: "172.28.150.23"
add quotes to string value, but why?
version.body-html:
I was installed mysql2! and I found the resolvtion.
when I change database.yml to:
development:
adapter: mysql2 encoding: utf8 reconnect: false database: "homeland_development" pool: 5 username: "monster" password: "123123" host: "172.28.150.23"

add quotes to string value, but why?
version.title: User mysql2 taked uninitialized constant Mysql error.

version.body:
The problem is that YAML is treating your password as a integer and the Mysql2 library generates an exception when passed a Fixnum for the password. The db:create task assumes that mysql is available and tries to rescue the error but the error class is Mysql2::Error not Mysql::Error so you get the undefined constant error.
The attached patch fixes the db:create task and I've raised an issue on http://github.com/brianmario/mysql2
version.body-html:
The problem is that YAML is treating your password as a integer and the Mysql2 library generates an exception when passed a Fixnum for the password. The db:create task assumes that mysql is available and tries to rescue the error but the error class is Mysql2::Error not Mysql::Error so you get the undefined constant error.

The attached patch fixes the db:create task and I've raised an issue on http://github.com/brianmario/mysql2
version.title: User mysql2 taked uninitialized constant Mysql error.
User mysql2 taked uninitialized constant Mysql error.

version.body:
(from [241dfa3c90838957d85022e81d777247e451d832]) Catch mysql2 access denied errors in rake db:create [#5432 state:resolved]
Signed-off-by: Xavier Noria <fxn@hashref.com> http://github.com/rails/rails/commit/241dfa3c90838957d85022e81d777247e451d832
version.body-html:
(from [241dfa3c90838957d85022e81d777247e451d832]) Catch mysql2 access denied errors in rake db:create [#5432 state:resolved]

Signed-off-by: Xavier Noria fxn@hashref.com
http://github.com/rails/rails/commit/241dfa3c90838957d85022e81d7772...
version.title: User mysql2 taked uninitialized constant Mysql error.

version.body:
(from [1fbb0684d267ca61e9409206c9939d0aeab609c9]) Catch mysql2 access denied errors in rake db:create [#5432 state:resolved]
Signed-off-by: Xavier Noria <fxn@hashref.com> http://github.com/rails/rails/commit/1fbb0684d267ca61e9409206c9939d0aeab609c9
version.body-html:
(from [1fbb0684d267ca61e9409206c9939d0aeab609c9]) Catch mysql2 access denied errors in rake db:create [#5432 state:resolved]

Signed-off-by: Xavier Noria fxn@hashref.com
http://github.com/rails/rails/commit/1fbb0684d267ca61e9409206c9939d...
version.title: User mysql2 taked uninitialized constant Mysql error.

version.body: It certainly works with database adapter set to mysql2, but still fails when using em_mysql2 (also provided with the mysql2 gem).
version.body-html: It certainly works with database adapter set to mysql2, but still fails when using em_mysql2 (also provided with the mysql2 gem).
version.title: User mysql2 taked uninitialized constant Mysql error.

version.body: Allright it works now with rails 3.0 final release.
version.body-html: Allright it works now with rails 3.0 final release.
